title: "Must be level 7 in order to-"
body: This forum says "You must be level 7 in order to" for just about anything you would want to do, whether it's making your own thread or posting a comment in an already made thread. It clearly doesn't mean ingame level because I'm level 15. So wtf does this mean and how do you 'level up' or whatever?

replies.body: It does mean in game actually xD. Sometimes the sync doesn't work the way it's supposed to, so posting here or clicking on the Boards Profile Syncing Tool up top will set things straight. Looks like this did the trick and I can see you as level 15 now.
